abstract.p: This cookbook provides a short introduction to Starlink facilities, especially SMURF, the Sub-Millimetre User Reduction Facility and Kappa, the Kernel Application Package, for reducing, displaying, and analysing ACSIS data. In particular, this cookbook illustrates the various steps required to reduce the data; and gives an overview of the ORAC-DR pipeline which carries out many of these steps using a single command. Specialised pipeline recipes are discussed.
